about_the_game:
Catagaia is a third person adventure game, with heavy focus on exploration and light survival. You don't know who you are, you don't know what you are, you just know that something compels you to get to the literal bottom of this world.

  • Explore the unique and otherworldly biomes of the under-earth
  • Meet and commune with spirits, which may bless you with abilities if you fulfill their requests
  • Establish camps to more easily get further and deeper into the world
  • Craft or find many tools which will aid you in your journey
  • Progressively unlock new movement abilities and explore old areas anew

name: Catagaia

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 @ 2.2GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600+ @ 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATi Radeon HD 2400 or NVIDIA GeForce 7600 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: You don't know who you are, you don't know what you are, you just know that something compels you to get to the literal bottom of this world. Spirits and alien landscapes surround you as you get deeper in this under-earth, try to survive and to make sense of it all.
